description: Returns a description of the cluster operation specified by the ARN.

parameters.name: ClusterOperationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the MSK cluster operation.

nested_items.name: ClusterOperationInfo
nested_items.description: Cluster operation information.

nested_items.name: ClientRequestId
nested_items.description: The ID of the API request that triggered this operation.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the cluster.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the operation was created.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the operation finished.

nested_items.name: ErrorInfo
nested_items.description: Describes the error if the operation fails.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: A number describing the error programmatically.

nested_items.name: ErrorString
nested_items.description: An optional field to provide more details about the error.

nested_items.name: OperationArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the cluster operation.

nested_items.name: OperationState
nested_items.description: State of the cluster operation.

nested_items.name: OperationSteps
nested_items.description: Steps completed during the operation.

nested_items.name: StepStatus
nested_items.description: The steps current status.

nested_items.name: StepName
nested_items.description: The name of the step.

nested_items.name: OperationType
nested_items.description: Type of the cluster operation.

nested_items.name: SourceClusterInfo
nested_items.description: Information about cluster attributes before a cluster is updated.

nested_items.name: BrokerEBSVolumeInfo
nested_items.description: Specifies the size of the EBS volume and the ID of the associated broker.

nested_items.name: KafkaBrokerNodeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the broker to update.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedThroughput
nested_items.description: EBS volume provisioned throughput information.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Provisioned throughput is enabled or not.

nested_items.name: VolumeThroughput
nested_items.description: Throughput value of the EBS volumes for the data drive on each kafka broker node in MiB per second.

nested_items.name: VolumeSizeGB
nested_items.description: Size of the EBS volume to update.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the changes in the configuration of the brokers.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: ARN of the configuration to use.

nested_items.name: Revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the configuration to use.

nested_items.name: NumberOfBrokerNodes
nested_items.description: The number of broker nodes in the cluster.

nested_items.name: EnhancedMonitoring
nested_items.description: Specifies which Apache Kafka metrics Amazon MSK gathers and sends to Amazon CloudWatch for this cluster.

nested_items.name: OpenMonitoring
nested_items.description: The settings for open monitoring.

nested_items.name: Prometheus
nested_items.description: Prometheus settings.

nested_items.name: JmxExporter
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the JMX Exporter.

nested_items.name: EnabledInBroker
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the JMX Exporter.

nested_items.name: NodeExporter
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the Node Exporter.

nested_items.name: EnabledInBroker
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the Node Exporter.

nested_items.name: KafkaVersion
nested_items.description: The Apache Kafka version.

nested_items.name: LoggingInfo
nested_items.description: You can configure your MSK cluster to send broker logs to different destination types. This is a container for the configuration details related to broker logs.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: Information about the Amazon MSK broker type.

nested_items.name: ClientAuthentication
nested_items.description: Includes all client authentication information.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: SASL/SCRAM authentication is enabled or not.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether IAM access control is enabled.

nested_items.name: CertificateAuthorityArnList
nested_items.description: List of ACM Certificate Authority ARNs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether you want to turn on or turn off TLS authentication.

nested_items.name: Unauthenticated
nested_items.description: Contains information about unauthenticated traffic to the cluster.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether you want to turn on or turn off unauthenticated traffic to your cluster.

nested_items.name: EncryptionInfo
nested_items.description: Includes all encryption-related information.

nested_items.name: EncryptionAtRest
nested_items.description: The data-volume encryption details.

nested_items.name: DataVolumeKMSKeyId
nested_items.description: The ARN of the AWS KMS key for encrypting data at rest. If you don't specify a KMS key, MSK creates one for you and uses it.

nested_items.name: EncryptionInTransit
nested_items.description: The details for encryption in transit.

nested_items.name: ClientBroker
nested_items.description: Indicates the encryption setting for data in transit between clients and brokers. The following are the possible values.

nested_items.name: InCluster
nested_items.description: When set to true, it indicates that data communication among the broker nodes of the cluster is encrypted. When set to false, the communication happens in plaintext.

nested_items.name: ConnectivityInfo
nested_items.description: Information about the broker access configuration.

nested_items.name: PublicAccess
nested_items.description: Public access control for brokers.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The value DISABLED indicates that public access is turned off. SERVICE_PROVIDED_EIPS indicates that public access is turned on.

nested_items.name: VpcConnectivity
nested_items.description: VPC connectivity access control for brokers.

nested_items.name: ClientAuthentication
nested_items.description: Includes all client authentication information for VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: SASL/SCRAM authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: SASL/IAM authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: TLS authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: StorageMode
nested_items.description: This controls storage mode for supported storage tiers.

nested_items.name: BrokerCountUpdateInfo
nested_items.description: Describes brokers being changed during a broker count update.

nested_items.name: CreatedBrokerIds
nested_items.description: Kafka Broker IDs of brokers being created.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: DeletedBrokerIds
nested_items.description: Kafka Broker IDs of brokers being deleted.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: TargetClusterInfo
nested_items.description: Information about cluster attributes after a cluster is updated.

nested_items.name: BrokerEBSVolumeInfo
nested_items.description: Specifies the size of the EBS volume and the ID of the associated broker.

nested_items.name: KafkaBrokerNodeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the broker to update.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedThroughput
nested_items.description: EBS volume provisioned throughput information.

nested_items.name: Enabled

nested_items.name: VolumeThroughput
nested_items.description: Throughput value of the EBS volumes for the data drive on each kafka broker node in MiB per second.

nested_items.name: VpcConnectionInfo
nested_items.description: Description of the VPC connection for CreateVpcConnection and DeleteVpcConnection operations.

nested_items.name: VpcConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the VPC Connection.

nested_items.name: UserIdentity
nested_items.description: Description of the requester that calls the API operation.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The identity type of the requester that calls the API operation.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the requester that calls the API operation.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when Amazon MSK creates the VPC Connnection.
